co.poynt.os.services.v1

Interface IPoyntProductService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IPoyntProductService.Stub

    public interface IPoyntProductService
extends IInterface
    Provides the interfaces necessary to retrive Catalogs and Products that belong to the business and store that the current terminal is associated with. All calls require the necessary permissions declared in the caller's Android Manifest file. Please refer to Poynt OS Permissions for more details. When the requested information is not available locally (Poynt Content Providers), it will be fetched from the Poynt Cloud and saved locally for future references.
    Since:
    1.0-beta2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPoyntProductService.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

    • Method Detail

      • getCatalog

        void getCatalog(String catalogId,
                IPoyntProductCatalogListener callback)
         throws RemoteException
        Retrieves the Catalog associated with the given catalogId. If the catalog information is not available locally, it will be fetched from the Poynt Cloud.
        Parameters:
        catalogId - ID of the catalog to retrieve
        callback - IPoyntProductCatalogListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getRegisterCatalog

        void getRegisterCatalog(IPoyntProductCatalogListener callback)
                 throws RemoteException
        Retrieves the Catalog associated with the terminal. If the catalog information is not available locally, it will be fetched from the Poynt Cloud.
        Parameters:
        callback - IPoyntProductCatalogListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getRegisterCatalogWithProducts

        void getRegisterCatalogWithProducts(IPoyntProductCatalogWithProductListener callback)
                             throws RemoteException
        Retrieves the CatalogWithProduct associated with the terminal. If the catalog information is not available locally, it will be fetched from the Poynt Cloud. This catalog contains a fully hydrated category and product lists so you do not have to perform additional calls to retreive the data.
        Parameters:
        callback - IPoyntProductCatalogWithProductListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getRegisterCatalogWithProductsFromCloud

        void getRegisterCatalogWithProductsFromCloud(IPoyntProductCatalogWithProductListener callback)
                                      throws RemoteException
        Retrieves the CatalogWithProduct associated with the terminal. This call will skip the local data store and access the Poynt Cloud directly. This catalog contains a fully hydrated category and product lists so you do not have to perform additional calls to retreive the data.
        Parameters:
        callback - IPoyntProductCatalogWithProductListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getRegisterCatalogFromCloud

        void getRegisterCatalogFromCloud(IPoyntProductCatalogListener callback)
                          throws RemoteException
        Retrieves the Catalog associated with the terminal. This call will skip the local data store and access the Poynt Cloud directly.
        Parameters:
        callback - IPoyntProductCatalogListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getProducts

        void getProducts(List<String> productIds,
                 IPoyntProductListListener callback)
          throws RemoteException
        Retrieves a list of all products associated with the given productIds. If the product information is not available locally, it will be fetched from the Poynt Cloud.
        Parameters:
        productIds - List of all productIds
        callback - IPoyntProductListListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getProductsFromCloud

        void getProductsFromCloud(List<String> productIds,
                          IPoyntProductListListener callback)
                   throws RemoteException
        Retrieves a list of all products associated with the given productIds. This call skips the local databases and accesses the data remotely from the Poynt Cloud.
        Parameters:
        productIds - List of all productIds
        callback - IPoyntProductListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getCategories

        void getCategories(String catalogId,
                   List<String> categoryIds,
                   IPoyntProductCategoriesListener callback)
            throws RemoteException
        Retrieves a list of all categories of products associated with the given categoryIds for the given catalogId. If the product information is not available locally, it will be fetched from the Poynt Cloud.
        Parameters:
        catalogId - Id of the catalog
        categoryIds - List of all categoryIds
        callback - IPoyntProductCategoriesListener
        Throws:
        RemoteException
